title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Miss Charlotte Hamilton (afterwards Mrs. Adair), the lady on Avhom this song was composed,  was at that time residing at Harvieston, near Dollar.

title: The complete works of Robert Burns.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: He imagines himself at Harvieston, in sight of the lofty Ochills, and he sings to Peggy Chalmers a little reproachful song.
